roleset.name: to render inactive

example.name: transitive
example.text: The sterilizing gene is expressed [*-21] just before the pollen is about [*-1]to develop and it deactivates the anthers of every flower in the plant .
example.arg: the anthers of every flower in the plant

roleset.note: DEACTIVATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deactivate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from deactivate.01-v predicate notes)
